title: Bill Atkinson has died
author: romanhn
aiHeadline: Bill Atkinson, the man who brought us the Macintosh GUI and made computers user-friendly, has passed away, leaving us all to wonder how we ever managed without his groundbreaking work.

title: Getting Past Procrastination
author: WaitWaitWha
aiHeadline: Getting past procrastination: the ultimate guide to finally doing everything you've been putting off for years, because clearly, you've got nothing better to do.

title: Low-Level Optimization with Zig

title: Convert photos to Atkinson dithering
author: nvahalik
aiHeadline: Convert photos to Atkinson dithering: because who doesn't want their pictures to look like they were taken in the 90s, complete with pixelated nostalgia and all the charm of a 1-bit display.
